name: The Final Room (Nick Browning)
description:
You've braved a dangerous dungeon, defeated evil enemies, and discovered incredible items, but before you can return to the world you have to defeat one final boss.

Unfortunately, me and my team weren't able to finish, so some animations are missing like invulnerability and there are some glitches, but we still had a ton of fun!

Dodge the boss's powerful attacks, while striking at its head. Make sure to use every tool at your disposal, like your double jump, dash, and hook shot, to stay as mobile as possible!

Use WASD to move, Space to Attack, Left Shift to Dash, and U, I, and O, for abilities.

This game was made as part of the Indie Tales Jam. The theme of One Room inspired us to make a game that focuses on the most important room in a dungeon, the boss room. 

Team Members:
Nick Browning - Coding, UI Art, Level Design
Dominic Vasi - Character Art

Any feedback in the comments is greatly appreciated!
